unnormalised: Hey folks, return policies are crucial, right? Imagine ordering a saree for Onam from Jaipur and finding it's damaged! A hassle-free return makes all the difference. Remember that time aunty Rekha had issues returning a mixer grinder near Chandni Chowk? Good policies build trust, especially for online biryani orders gone wrong! Quick returns, like "within 7 days", are super helpful.
